Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Lamon
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Laramie, Addison, Cicero and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Lamon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Laramie, Addison, Cicero and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Lamon.

Allow extra travel time.
